title: Kristin Mitchell

sections.heading: Overview
content: Kristin Mitchell is a content enhancement editor for WebMD. Mitchell most recently was an editor for a medical journal specializing in rheumatology. She also wrote and edited for Bloomberg Industry Group, focusing on human resources news, and worked as a producer for Gannett/USA Today editing content for some of their regional newspapers.
Mitchell has a BA in English/Journalism from Wake Forest University and a Professional Sequence in Editing certification from UC Berkeley Extension. She is a member of the Council of Science Editors.

Mitchell’s home life revolves around loving and nurturing her fraternal twin boys and toddler daughter while also trying to persuade them to stop growing up. With any spare time, Mitchell tries to find rest.
